data.question: Create a responsive two-column layout without media queries.
data.answer: Use CSS Grid with auto-fit and minmax: grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));

data.question: Center a div horizontally and vertically.
data.answer: Use Flexbox: display:flex; justify-content:center; align-items:center;

data.question: Create a sticky header that stays on top while scrolling.
data.answer: Use position: sticky; top: 0; z-index: 100;

data.question: Prevent layout shift when loading images.
data.answer: Define width and height attributes or use CSS aspect-ratio.

data.question: Create a card hover effect with smooth animation.
data.answer: Use transition and transform: translateY() or scale().

data.question: Make text truncate with ellipsis.
data.answer: Use overflow:hidden; white-space:nowrap; text-overflow:ellipsis;

data.question: Build a responsive navbar without JavaScript.
data.answer: Use Flexbox/Grid with wrap and checkbox hack for toggles.

data.question: Difference between display:none and visibility:hidden?
data.answer: display:none removes element from layout; visibility:hidden keeps space.

data.question: Create equal-height columns.
data.answer: Use Flexbox or Grid â€” both handle equal heights automatically.

data.question: Implement dark mode using CSS only.
data.answer: Use CSS variables and toggle a class on body.

data.question: Make an element fixed at bottom only on mobile.
data.answer: Use media queries with position: fixed inside max-width.

data.question: Difference between rem and em?
data.answer: rem is relative to root; em is relative to parent.

data.question: Create a circular avatar image.
data.answer: Use border-radius: 50% with fixed width and height.

data.question: How to align items to the bottom of a container?
data.answer: Use align-items: flex-end in Flexbox.

data.question: Fix overflow issues on mobile devices.
data.answer: Use max-width:100%; overflow-x:hidden; and responsive units.

data.question: Create a CSS-only tooltip.
data.answer: Use :hover with ::after pseudo-element.

data.question: Difference between inline-block and flex?
data.answer: Flex provides alignment control; inline-block does not.

data.question: How to optimize CSS for performance?
data.answer: Avoid deep selectors, use reusable classes, reduce repaint/reflow.

data.question: Create a skeleton loader using CSS.
data.answer: Use animated gradient with keyframes.

data.question: How to create a diagonal background section?
data.answer: Use transform: skewY() or clip-path.
